Package no.hiof.webframework.Application.Chat

Class ChatRoom

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.webframework.Application.Chat.ChatRoom
public class ChatRoom extends Object
A chat room that allows users to send and receive messages using a specified chat strategy.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ChatRoom(ChatMethod chatMethod)
    Creates a ChatRoom object based on the given chat method.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatRoom

      public ChatRoom(ChatMethod chatMethod) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a ChatRoom object based on the given chat method.
      Parameters:
      chatMethod - the type of chat method, either PRIVATE or GROUP
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the chatMethod is null

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(User sender, String message)
      Sends a message from the specified sender to the chat room using the chat strategy.
      Parameters:
      sender - the user sending the message
      message - the message to send

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(User sender, String message)
      Receives a message from the specified sender in the chat room using the chat strategy.
      Parameters:
      sender - the user sending the message
      message - the message received

    • getChatHistory

      public List<String> getChatHistory()
      Returns the chat history for the chat room using the chat strategy.
      Returns:
      a list of strings representing the chat history
